title: FS: 1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug DAN BROUTHERS
author: Smanzari

posts.post_title: FS: 1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug DAN BROUTHERS
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is an 1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug Dan Brouthers. This is the Baltimore version, but an owner a long time ago did a little doctoring and attempted to add a new team (Philadelphia).  I'm looking for $PENDING or best offer for this card. It's not often that you can get a 19th century Hall of Famer for this price!  Shipping will be via Priority Mail with a DC # and I prefer Paypal Gift but will consider other options!

[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt62/smanzari/Dan.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt62/smanzari/Danb.jpg[/IMG]
